assessments.status_rationale: Headlines indicate heightened risk of a shutdown and no enacted CR/appropriations yet, but the outcome depends on actions by 00:01 EDT on 2025-10-01; no definitive resolution reported.
No official Tesla Q3 deliveries release cited; deadline is 2025-10-04.
ONS September CPI release is due 2025-10-16; no print reported.
BLS CPI release is scheduled for 2025-10-10; no shelter MoM figure yet.
No EIA storage report showing ≥3.80 Tcf referenced; window remains open until 2025-11-15.
No report of LME 3M copper settling at ≥$9,500/MT; deadline 2025-11-30.
No confirmation of Bitcoin closing ≥$75,000 on any UTC day; deadline 2025-11-30.
No evidence that the 30Y–5Y U.S. Treasury spread closed ≥0.60 pp; window open until 2025-11-30.
No update on Drewry Shanghai–Los Angeles spot rate relative to 2025-09-05; deadline 2025-10-31.
Alphabet has not reported Q3 2025 results in the cited news; deadline 2025-10-31.
